io.github.trulyfree.easyaspi.lib.module

Class ModuleHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.trulyfree.easyaspi.lib.module.ModuleHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Module

    public class ModuleHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements Module
    Helper class for Module configuration, downloading, and establishment.
    Since:
    v0.0.1-alpha
    Author:
    vtcakavsmoace

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private EAPActivity activity
      The activity which owns this ModuleHandler.
      private dalvik.system.DexClassLoader classLoader

      The directory containing the configs that this handler is aware of.

      The configs that this handler is aware of.

      The configs that the ModuleHandler should define by default.

      The directory containing the dexed classes that this handler will manipulate.

      The Gson instance that this ModuleHandler uses.
      private java.io.File jarDir
      The directory containing the jars that this handler will manipulate.
      private java.io.File optimizedDexDir
      The directory containing the optimized dex file that this handler will load modules from.
      private java.io.File undexedDir
      The directory containing the undexed classes that this handler will manipulate.

        private java.io.File dexedJar
        The directory containing the dexed classes that this handler will manipulate.

        private java.io.File optimizedDexDir
        The directory containing the optimized dex file that this handler will load modules from.

      • classLoader

        private dalvik.system.DexClassLoader classLoader
        The class loader used by the ModuleHandler to load up modules.

      • debugConfigs

        private ModuleConfig[] debugConfigs
        The configs that the ModuleHandler should define by default. This exists for developers to test their modules without having to use an upstream repository on every build.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ModuleHandler

        public ModuleHandler(@NonNull
                     EAPActivity activity)
        Standard constructor for ModuleHandler. All ModuleHandlers MUST be instantiated with a reference to an EAPActivity. You may set the value of debugConfigs by modifying this constructor.
        Parameters:
        activity - The activity which owns this module handler.

    • Method Detail

      • getModuleConfig

        public ModuleConfig getModuleConfig(@NonNull
                                    java.lang.String configUrl)
                             throws java.io.IOException,
                                    com.google.gson.JsonParseException
        Returns the module config located at the specified URL.
        Parameters:
        configUrl - The URL to download from.
        Returns:
        config The ModuleConfig located at the URL.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the download fails.
        com.google.gson.JsonParseException - If the instantiation through Gson fails.

      • getNewModule

        public boolean getNewModule(@Nullable
                            StagedCallback callback,
                            @NonNull
                            ModuleConfig config,
                            @Nullable
                            java.util.Stack<java.lang.String> alreadyDownloaded,
                            boolean refreshDexed)
                     throws java.io.IOException,
                            com.google.gson.JsonParseException
        Downloads and establishes a module given a specified module config.
        Parameters:
        callback - The callback to report progress to.
        config - The config to base off of.
        alreadyDownloaded - URLs which we have already downloaded from.
        refreshDexed - Whether or not to refresh the dex on finish.
        Returns:
        success Whether or not the module was downloaded successfully.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the download fails.
        com.google.gson.JsonParseException - If the ModuleConfig's config URL contains a malformed config.

      • remove

        public boolean remove(StagedCallback callback,
                      @NonNull
                      ModuleConfig config)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Deletes a Module from the directories known by this handler.
        Parameters:
        callback - The callback to report progress to.
        config - The config to delete.
        Returns:
        success Whether the config was successfully removed.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the deletion process fails.

      • clearUntrackedJars

        private void clearUntrackedJars()
        Clears all jars not referenced by a ModuleConfig.

      • refreshAll

        public void refreshAll(StagedCallback callback)
                throws java.io.IOException,
                       com.google.gson.JsonParseException
        Redownloads and reestablishes all Modules.
        Parameters:
        callback - The callback to report progress to.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the download or file processes fail.
        com.google.gson.JsonParseException - If a config downloaded is not a valid json.

      • fromJson

        public ModuleConfig fromJson(java.lang.String json)
                      throws com.google.gson.JsonParseException
        Converts a String json to a ModuleConfig instance.
        Parameters:
        json - The json to parse.
        Returns:
        config The ModuleConfig instantiated by this json.
        Throws:
        com.google.gson.JsonParseException - If the json is malformed or not of type ModuleConfig.

      • toJson

        public java.lang.String toJson(ModuleConfig config)
        Converts a ModuleConfig instance to a String json.
        Parameters:
        config - The config to jsonify.
        Returns:
        json The json generated from this config.

      • loadModule

        public EAPDisplayableModule loadModule(ModuleConfig config)
                                throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                       java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                                       java.lang.InstantiationException
        Instantiates a EAPDisplayableModule from a given config.
        Parameters:
        config - The ModuleConfig to base off of.
        Returns:
        module The target module.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - If the targetModule field of config is not a class we know of.
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - If the targetModule field of config is not a class we see.
        java.lang.InstantiationException - If the targetModule field of config is not an instantiable class.

      • instantiate

        public java.lang.Object instantiate(java.lang.String classname)
                             throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                    java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                                    java.lang.InstantiationException
        Instantiates an Object given a class.
        Parameters:
        classname - The fully qualified name of the class to instantiate.
        Returns:
        obj The instantiation of the target class.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - If the classname did not associate with a known class.
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - If we cannot access the target class.
        java.lang.InstantiationException - If we cannot instantiate the target class with an empty constructor.
